notifications.playerOffline: Player {player} is offline and cannot receive roll requests
notifications.allActorsHaveInitiative: All selected actors already have initiative
notifications.actorsSkippingDeathSave: The following actors don't need death saves: {actors}

debugMode.label: Debug Mode
debugMode.hint: Enable debug mode to show additional logging information

rollRequestsEnabled.label: Roll Requests Enabled
rollRequestsEnabled.hint: Enable or disable roll requests functionality

useGMTargetTokens.label: Use GM Targeted Tokens
useGMTargetTokens.hint: When players confirm a requested roll, this setting will force use of GM targeted tokens instead of player targeted tokens. If this setting is disabled, the GM targets will only be transferred if the player has no targets.

skipDialogs.label: Skip Roll Dialogs on Requests
skipDialogs.hint: Enable this to skip the Roll Configuration windows when you request rolls from a player or when rolling for groups of multiple NPCs.

rollInterceptionEnabled.label: Intercept GM Rolls for Players
rollInterceptionEnabled.hint: When enabled, rolls made by the GM for player characters will be automatically redirected to the owning player

notifications.socketlibMissing: SocketLib module is required by Roll Requests, but is not active. The module will not work as intended until you enable socketlib.

dialogs.noCombatActive: There is no active combat encounter. Would you like to create one before rolling initiative?
dialogs.rerollInitiative: The following actors already have initiative: {actors}. Do you want to re-roll their initiative?
